local city = Context.get('currentMessage')
Context.set('city', city)

local hook = "http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=98dde8c07fce46b2843215719212201&q="..Context.get('city')

local data = Invoke.webhook(hook, 'GET', '')
Debug.print(data)

Workflow.branch(94)

Template.compile([[Welcome {{visitor}},

Please let me know the city where you live in:]])
